Team 4



This team is hiding behind a generic name. They had a late start because the team had to be revamped early on. They are now very strong and include Mike D., Brian B., Chris P., Ian, Phil, and Lisa. They are a mean crew and out to do some damage. Watch out for the underdogs, thats for sure.
